subject: From World Bank Group
body:
From World Bank Group
Washington, D.C., United States
 
 
RE: TRANSFER OF $6,500,000.00 MILLION USD.
 
 
Attention Beneficiary:
 
 
Am instructed to keep you posted through email on the out come of our emergency meeting today with the World Bank new elected president Mr. Ajay Banga in collaboration with the United Nations Organization (UNO) I hereby inform you that your winnings/inheritance payment file has
been Signed and forwarded to Bank for International Settlements (BIS). here in Washington DC,and I will be giving you the contact information of your Payment Officer who is in charge of your funds with Bank for International Settlements (BIS).
 
 
Make sure you contact him with the details below, he will help you to get your funds, which was deposited in a domiciliary account with Bank for International Settlements (BIS).
 
 
Name: Bright Douglas
Position: Remittance Manager BIS BANK
Email: ( 
brightdouglas645@gmail.com
 )
Cell Phone: +1(202)792-3049
 
 
Contact Mr. Bright Douglas with your information such as:
 
Full name,.....
Address,......
Date of birth,......
Mobile phone,....
Occupation,....
 
 
He is the person in charge of the transfer of your funds via Electronic funds transfer (EFT) from Bank for International Settlements (BIS). to any bank of your choice world wide.
 
Upon your final transferring of your funds and confirmation into your Bank Account don't fail to keep me posted for record purpose.
 
Congratulations and i await to hear from you.
 
 
Yours Sincerely,
 
Mr. Steven Abatua
World Bank International Auditor

subject: Re:   From World Bank Group
body:
Hello Mr. Steven Abatua,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm curious, how was my name selected for this? Also, could you please provide more details about the Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) process?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
*providing banking and membership services to individuals, companies, trade
unions, charities, credit unions and membership organisation sectors.
We **listen
and understand what our customers wants  and we also developed a service
which offers a wide range of benefits to our customers. One of our
key objectives is to provide value for money banking for all of
our customers. That means delivering a wide range of services that can
be **tailored
to your exact needs, including the smooth transfer of your funds from BIS
BANK, Your details has been forwarded to us earlier by Mr Steven Abatua
 declaring you as a beneficiary to receive the total sum
of  US$6,500,000.00 USD. (United State Dollars).*

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about your services. It sounds like you offer a comprehensive range of banking and membership services, which is quite impressive.

I'm curious to know more about the process of transferring funds from BIS BANK. Could you please elaborate on how this works? Also, I'm intrigued by the mention of Mr. Steven Abatua. May I ask how he is associated with your organization?

Please note that while I am interested in learning more, I would prefer not to share any personal information at this stage.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
*WELCOME TO BIS BANK*
*TELEGRAPHIC TRANSFER NOTICE OF *
*US$6,500,000.00 MILLION  DOLLARS TRANSFER*

*Dear Beneficiary;*

*BIS BANK United States wishes to officially inform you that your
wining/inheritance payment **sum of US$6,500,000.00 has been approved for
final crediting into your personal bank account  in your country
Congratulations to you.*

*The BANK FOR INTERNATIONAL SETTLEMENT (BIS Bank ) concludes
the verification of your file. After going through all the documents
of claim received by Mr. Steven Abatua, World Bank  International Auditor
 with justification and verification from the **global strategy Americans,
we are completely satisfied and you have been confirmed to receive your
funds. We must ensure your Funds is **transferred to your destination Bank
Account within 12 hours or delivered to your address as soon as possible.*

*We are socially responsible organization, providing banking and membership
services to individuals, companies, trade unions, charities, credit unions
and membership organisation sectors. We **listen and understand what our
customers wants  and we also developed a service which offers a wide range
of benefits to our customers. One of our key objectives is to provide value
for money banking for all of our customers. That means delivering a wide
range of services that can be **tailored to your exact needs, including the
smooth transfer of your funds from BIS BANK, Your details has
been forwarded to us earlier by Mr Steven Abatua  declaring you as a
beneficiary to receive the total sum of  US$6,500,000.00 USD. (United State
Dollars).*

*Without wasting much of your time we have three ways of disbursing funds
to our customers and below are the options so you are advice to **choose
from the below options and it fee.*

*1. Non-Resident Savings Account (Online Account): Initial deposit $1,050
USD payment methods are Bank transfers BITCOINS/WALMART or PAYPAL.*

*2. Bank to Bank wire Transfer: Transfer Charge $820 USD payment methods
are Bank Transfer BITCOINS/WALMART or PAYPAL.*

*3. Loaded ATM CARD: Delivery fee $715 USD payment methods are Bank
Transfers BITCOINS/WALMART or PAYPAL.*

*No deduction from this funds, so Kindly choose from the above
given options the best option you wish to receive the funds and revert
back to us for the immediate procedure.*

*This law is stated according to section 35 And 36 of the banking sector
interaction realm of our constitution and the outside world. Based on
article of association and memorandum of association, the **controlling
agency of United State, your happiness suits our stand we will make sure
that your fund is fully endorsed to your destination as soon as you have
comprehended with our instructions. NB: THIS*
*TRANSACTION IS BEING MONITORED BY THE UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT IN ORDER*
*TO GUARDS US FROM INTERNET IMPOSTORS.*

*If at any time you have questions, concerns or comments, please contact us
as we strive to ensure that you will always receive a prompt and courteous
attention,*

*I wait to read from you soon.*

*THANK YOU FOR BEEN IN SERVE WITH US.*

*Yours Sincerely*
*MR BRIGHT DOUGLAS*

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
Hello MR BRIGHT DOUGLAS,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about this opportunity, although I must admit, it's a bit overwhelming. 

I have a few questions if you don't mind. Firstly, could you please explain more about the three ways of disbursing funds? I'm not very familiar with these methods and would like to understand them better before making a decision.

Secondly, could you provide more information about Mr. Steven Abatua? How did he come to declare me as the recipient of such a large sum?

Lastly, what does it mean that my happiness suits your stand? I'm not quite sure I understand that part.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
*Below are the three ways to deliver your payments  to you *

*1. Non-Resident Savings Account (Online Account): Initial deposit $1,050
USD payment methods are Bank transfers BITCOINS/WALMART or PAYPAL.*

*2. Bank to Bank wire Transfer: Transfer Charge $820 USD payment methods
are Bank Transfer BITCOINS/WALMART or PAYPAL.*

*3. Loaded ATM CARD: Delivery fee $715 USD payment methods are Bank
Transfers BITCOINS/WALMART or PAYPAL.*

*Mr Steven Abatua is a member of World Bank Group *

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to learn about these different payment methods. I'm not very familiar with some of them, like BITCOINS and WALMART. Could you please explain how they work? 

Also, I've heard about Mr. Steven Abatua being a member of the World Bank Group. What exactly does his role entail? 

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to learn about the different payment methods available, such as bank transfers, Bitcoins, Walmart, and PayPal. 

I'm curious about how these methods work. For instance, how does a bank to bank wire transfer work? And what is a loaded ATM card? 

Also, I'd love to know more about Mr. Steven Abatua's role in the World Bank Group. What exactly does he do?

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: From World Bank Group
body:
BITCOINS and WALMART. Is also a fast way to receive payment and to quickly
proceeds immediately after you choose an option to remit payment to your
position.

Mr Steven Abatua is a member of Auditor department  with  World Bank Group
